tipulseemMessage: You can open sub-accounts to provide limited access for other people in your business.
addQuickButtons: Add quick buttons to your favorite pages
chartTooltip: Click on any section of the graph to see a list of your recipients
tooltipPurchaseNewFeature: Purchase directly from the dashboard by clicking on the SMS or Newsletter options below. Have questions? Call support at 03-5240290
2faDescription:
Would you like to add 2-factor authentication to your account?

2-factor authentication will send a one-time password to your email
when you log in and increase the security of your account with Pulseem.

You can always add or remove this feature later in the Account Details section of your account
changePassword:
Pay attention!
Your account's password was not changed at least since for the
last 6 months, please change your Password.
In case the password won't be change in the next two weeks, The account will be blocked
And email with reset password instruction will be sent to the Email which defined in Account Settings page
